description: CGT 520 final project
The game is developed using WebGL instead of OpenGL for web browser support.
Camera can be controlled by mouse and/or keyboard input.
Collision detection and reaction: Bullets has collisions and has sound when collides with walls and enemies.
Texture use for the floor, walls, enemies, character guns (can be change by keyboard), and bullet.
Sounds used as background can me play and multiple soundtracks were added. Sounds effects for the shoot of a gun, the bullet collision, and the enemy death.
Scripts to represent data with the VTK library
Use barometric data from NASA Earth Observatory to represent Earth as a plane and sphere.
Techniques to visualize CT scan data (Tomography scans).
Visualization of (NOAA-PSL) dataset of air pressure level.
GUI include to manipulate interest parameters.
CGT 521 group final project
Implementation of a 3D graphic calculator with the marching cubes algorithm.
Implementation of a 3D axis and positioned of the calculator (graph sphere, torus, genus, Quadratic cylinder, and Pillow tooth)
Implemented 5 different 3D surfaces functions.
Apply a random texture over the generated surface.
Able to control the number of triangles (resolution) of the generated surface.
